taskDefinition.name: Active Directory Computer Remove Groups
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Finds a user in active directory by Distinguished Name (Computer Name) and adds the computer as a member to one or more groups.

parameter.label: Search By
parameter.tooltip: 'Distinguished Name', 'Full Name', 'User Name', 'Computer Name', or 'Email Address'

parameter.label: Search Value
parameter.tooltip: The value of the Distinguished Name (Computer Name).

parameter.label: Groups
parameter.tooltip: The common name(s) of the group(s) to remove. More than one group can be specified by separating each group with a comma.
